title: Radio City Music Hall and International Casino: Carpet Design-Violins and Wine Glasses
medium: Brush and gouache, graphite on off-white illustration board, lined.
description: Pattern in shades of brown of violins and wine glasses placed in diagonal rows so that a row of two violins (with their necks facing away from each other) alternates with a row of three violins with wine glasses in between.  See 1975-11-42 and 1975-11-43 for variations on the same pattern in different colorways.
name: Drawing
